channel.title: Ugh where do i start.. HELP
channel.description:
ok a "few" things. need help moving home to edge. also need a ::unjail also making home tele go to edge n all that st00f
i know its all client.java but i really dont get how to put the codes in to scared to get erros =\
helps pls[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2009, 12:42:34 am[/size][hr][quote="dylan cast"]ok a "few" things. need help moving home to edge. also need a ::unjail also making home tele go to edge n all that st00f. also a working duel arena would be nice =] lol
i know its all client.java but i really dont get how to put the codes in to scared to get erros =\
helps pls[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @dylan_cast dylan cast
item.description:

symbol : variable ToX
location: class client
c.ToX = 2751;
^
client.java:7520: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String)
location: class client
c.sendMessage(“Now be a good boy :P, your now in nowhere land!!”)
;
^
2 errors
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

how do i classify the int p

if ((absX >= 2986 && absX <= 2990 && absY >=3342 && absY <=3346 )) { sendMessage("You can't log out in jail!");

That makes it so you can’t log out, atleast i think, tell me if it works.[/quote]

item.title: Ugh where do i start.. HELP
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Put it under an existing command, doesn’t matter what command, but it has to be in the commands area, or else it will not work and you will get errors, also remember it’s correctly placed out and in similar position with the rest of the commands.

Read full topic

item.title: Ugh where do i start.. HELP
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

  1. For making home tele go to edge, it’s easy just search this in client.java
command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")

It is the ::home command, change the coordinates you have now to the coordinates you wan’t.

When you edit this, when you click the home teleport you will teleport home, also, when you type ::home, you will teleport there also.

Here is my jail, and unjail commands:
(CHANGE IF YOU WANT!)

Unjail - } else if (command.startsWith("unjail") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 1) { String name = command.substring(7); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 2751; c.teleportToY = 2749; c.teleblock = false; c.sendMessage("Now be a good boy :P, your now in nowhere land!!"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

Jail - } if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) { String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 2773; c.teleportToY = 2794; c.teleblock = true; c.sendMessage("You Have been thrown to JAIL!"); c.sendMessage("Lul can't escape biattttchhh!"); c.teleblock = true; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + ": just JAILED the player : " + command.substring(5); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

If you need anymore help just post tehee :P.

Read full topic
